sentences.en: A canny bureaucratic infighter , Moorer made no pretense of academic subtlety.
sentences.cn: 穆勒是个机警的官场角逐者, 但他并不装作高深莫测.

sentences.en: A canny investor would need to predict when the dollar will once more start tumbling.
sentences.cn: 精明的投资者需要预计到美元何时会再次大跌。

sentences.en: But I'm trying to be a little canny about it.
sentences.cn: 但是我想对此谨慎一些.

sentences.en: Chief among these is his brother - in - law , the canny political veteran, Chang Sung - taek.
sentences.cn: 其中主要的便是他的 妹夫 —— 精明的政坛老手张成泽(ChangSungTaek).

sentences.en: Especially, the improved Canny operator is worthy of referring in other similar kinds of detecting system.
sentences.cn: 特别是改进的Canny算子算法,对其它类似检测系统也具有较高参考价值.

sentences.en: Have you got a canny card up your sleeve?
sentences.cn: 你有什么好点子 吗 ?

sentences.en: He was canny , open 0 handed , brisk , candid, and modest.
sentences.cn: 译文:他为人大方,有生气,忠厚耿直, 谦虚.

sentences.en: He was canny and had his own plans, but did not like to disclose them.
sentences.cn: 他有自己的打算,有些心眼, 但不好向别人讲论.

sentences.en: He was far too canny to risk giving himself away.
sentences.cn: 他非常精明，不会冒险暴露自己。

sentences.en: He was like a canny wolf prowling in a forest of trees of his own creation.
sentences.cn: 他就像一只狡猾的狼,在他自己造的一座树林里徘徊觅食.

sentences.en: Johnson was plainly a canny individual.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊显然是个狡猾的人物.

sentences.en: Some analysts believe he has made a canny political manoeuvre.
sentences.cn: 一些分析家认为，他的这一政治举措很高明。

sentences.en: The canny Premier covered his back by pointing out that he was of Scottish stock.
sentences.cn: 精明狡猾的首相辩解说自己是苏格兰血统。

sentences.en: The canny Scotsman was more than a match for the swindlers.
sentences.cn: 这个精明的苏格兰人比骗子还历害.

sentences.en: You're a canny one, sir . You really had me going.

trans.tran_cn: 精明的，狡猾的，俭约的，谨慎的
trans.tran_en: clever, careful, and not easily deceived, especially in business or politics
